alert.note: Alert for Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 5:49AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Mainly mountain snow through this evening... Periods of light snow will become somewhat heavier and more steady this afternoon into early this evening across the portion of Southwest Montana bordering Idaho and Wyoming. Total snow accumulations in the valleys and on mountain passes will mostly be an inch or two, but mountains above pass level could receive 2 to 4 inches. Areas favored for more persistent light snow include Big Sky, West Yellowstone, Raynolds Pass, and Monida Pass. Those traveling in this region should be alert for areas of reduced visibility and changing road conditions.
